thread.title: 35 killed in terror attack on night club in Istanbul
thread.title_full: 35 killed in terror attack on night club in Istanbul

title: 35 killed in terror attack on night club in Istanbul
text:
35 killed in terror attack on night club in Istanbul Xinhua | Updated: 2017-01-01 08:02 
Police secure area near an Istanbul nightclub, Turkey, January 1, 2017. [Photo/Agencies] 
ISTANBUL -- Thirty-five people were killed and 40 others wounded in a shooting attack on a popular nightclub in Istanbul early Sunday morning, said Istanbul governor Vasip Sahin. Sahin said the terror attack was carried out by one single gunman. A security analyst, who declined to be named, told Xinhua that the attacker killed the security guards before storming into the club, which reportedly gathered as many as 400 for New Year celebration. The analyst said the gunman changed his ammunition clip several times in the shooting spree. Previous Page 1 2 Next Page Related Stories
